sentences.en: And also for your faith in hand - drawn animation, which still can pack an emotional wallop.
sentences.cn: 同时也感谢大家对于手工绘制的动画的热爱.

sentences.en: And besides, if they did, Israel could always go back in and wallop them again.
sentences.cn: 换句话说, 如果他们还这么做, 以色列也仍然可以回去再给他们来一次沉重的打击.

sentences.en: Down he went with a wallop!
Grenville took another wallop plumb on the jaw.
sentences.cn: 格伦维尔又受了一拳，正中下巴。

sentences.en: He crashed down on the floor with a wallop.
sentences.cn: 他砰的一声倒在地板上了.

sentences.en: He hit the floor with a wallop.
If I ever catch the rascal I'll really wallop him!
sentences.cn: 我要是逮住这个流氓,非狠狠揍他一顿不可!

sentences.en: It was Vodka, and it packed quite a wallop.
sentences.cn: 那是伏特加, 劲很足.

sentences.en: Once, she walloped me over the head with a frying pan.
sentences.cn: 有一次，她用煎锅狠狠地砸了我的头。

sentences.en: Phoenix: sign like a phoenix head on fly, a strong vision wallop.
sentences.cn: 凤凰: 标志犹如一只凤凰迎面飞来, 有很强的视觉冲击力.

sentences.en: Stick can't walk but he packs a wallop.
sentences.cn: 棒不能走路,但他包冲击.

sentences.en: Strong falling is to use the wallop of current to achieve blowdown.
sentences.cn: 冲落则是利用水流的冲击力达到一次排污.
这本书产生了巨大的影响.

sentences.en: With one brutal wallop, Clarke flattened him.
sentences.cn: 克拉克毫不留情地一拳把他打翻在地。

sentences.en: With one brutal wallop, Leticia flattened him.
sentences.cn: 莱蒂西亚毫不留情地一拳把他打翻在地。

trans.tran_cn: 乱窜, 猛冲, (车等)颠簸, 沸腾作用
trans.tran_en: to hit someone or something very hard, especially with your hand
